word: H4616 - מַעַן - maʻan - mah'-an - Because of

sections.paragraph: அந்த, நிமித்தம். இல்லாத, படிக்கு, படி, முடிவில் - எச்சம்
purpose, intent, for the sake of, in view of, on account of, for the purpose of, to the intent that, in order to, to the end that

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From H6030; properly heed, that is, purpose; used only adverbially, on account of (as a motive or an aim), teleologically in order that: - because of, to the end (intent) that, for (to, . . . ‘s sake), + lest, that, to.
Cognate: H3282, H4616, H4617, H5772, H6030, H6256, H6258, H6261, H6262, H6278
